title: General Electric : number of employees 2005 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees in thousands, with a total of 14 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2014 to 2010.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010 to 2007.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2014.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2007 to 2005.
gold: This statistic shows the approximate number of employees at General Electric each year from 2005 to 2018 . In 2018 , General Electric employed around 283,000 people worldwide . Total number of GE employees General Electric conducts business in virtually every part of the world , with over 180 countries served .
